item.title: How can i do this
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

Watch to my code, it is saying :
if your smithing is 99 or higher
Teleport to X = 3233
Teleport to Y = 9316
Send a message “You teleport to the smithing area”
ELSE (if you have smithing 98 or lower)
Send a message “You Need smithing 99 to get in”

So the else is your "if(playerIsMember == 0)

Read full topic

item.title: How can i do this
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

oops

case 4388: // Portal At Front.
if (playerLevel[13] == 99)
teleportToX = 3233;
teleportToY = 9316;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the Member Area.”);
if (playerLevel[13] <= 98)
sendMessage(“You need 99 smithing to enter this portal!”);
break;

This should work:

case 4388: // Portal At Front. if (playerLevel[13] >= 99) { teleportToX = 3233; teleportToY = 9316; sendMessage("you teleport to the members area."); } else { sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break;[ }/code]
